name: 209-mi-document
description: María Ingeniería API de Gestión Documental

scripts.build: prisma generate && npm run clean && tsc --build && npm run copy-schema
scripts.rover-publish-staging: rover subgraph publish Maria-Ingenieria@staging --name mi-document --schema ./schema.graphql --routing-url http://localhost:4209
scripts.rover-publish-current: rover subgraph publish Maria-Ingenieria@current --name mi-document --schema ./schema.graphql --routing-url http://localhost:4209

author: César González Groh
